text: @realDonaldTrump The way Trump is managing this crisis, Coronavirus will be a major problem in U.S. for a long time. If he was smart, he would do a strict lockdown like other countries that are recovering now so we can get back to our normal lives sooner. Trump’s plan will kill many many people.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
